snippet: As Syria’s civil war rapidly escalates, hope for a diplomatic solution is fading as Russia hinders the advancement of a cease-fire.
abstract: Editorial, citing bombing that killed at least three of Pres Bashar al-Assad's senior officials, contends the Syrian conflict is rapidly escalating beyond the reach of Western-brokered diplomacy; calls on Russia to cease its intransigent support of Assad's regime so that United Nations sanctions can be implemented while they still have a chance of success.
lead_paragraph: As Syria’s civil war rapidly escalates, hope for a diplomatic solution is fading as Russia hinders the advancement of a cease-fire.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
